/* Poetry */

Literature is a broad term for written works, from artistic and creative writing like poems, novels, and plays to more informational material like articles and manuals. The common, "high art" definition refers to works of artistic merit that explore ideas, emotions, and experiences, often using creative and expressive language, while the broadest definition includes all written material on a topic. The meaning of "literature" can be distinguished by the purpose of the writing—whether it is meant
